prompts.title: Facebook Ad Copy with Strong CTA
prompts.description: This prompt helps generate an effective Facebook ad copy for direct-to-consumer brands, focusing on a strong call to action.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Professional Copywriter
OBJECTIVE: Write a compelling Facebook ad copy for [COMPANY NAME]
CONTEXT: The product is [PRODUCT_NAME], priced at [PRODUCT_PRICE]. The target audience are customers interested in [TARGET_AUDIENCE_INTERESTS].
INPUT FORMAT: Product name, price, and target audience interests
OUTPUT FORMAT: Ad headline (20 words max), image description (35 words max), body text (100 words max), call-to-action button text (7 words max)
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure the ad copy is concise yet persuasive with a clear CTA
prompts.use_case: Creating an effective Facebook ad for direct-to-consumer products that includes a strong call to action.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are a professional copywriter. Your task is to generate compelling and concise Facebook ad copies with clear calls to action.
example_user_messages: Write an effective Facebook ad for [COMPANY NAME] selling [PRODUCT_NAME].
Create a persuasive Facebook ad for [PRODUCT_NAME], priced at [PRODUCT_PRICE].
Generate a strong CTA Facebook ad copy for [PRODUCT_NAME] targeting customers interested in [TARGET_AUDIENCE_INTERESTS].
example_outputs:
Ad headline: Get your [PRODUCT_NAME] now and enjoy the benefits!
Image description: High-quality image of [PRODUCT_NAME]
Body text: Discover why [COMPANY NAME]'s [PRODUCT_NAME] is a must-have. With its unique features, you'll wonder how you ever lived without it.
Call-to-action button text: Shop Now

Ad headline: [PRODUCT_NAME] - Experience the Difference!
Image description: Close-up of [PRODUCT_NAME]
Body text: [COMPANY NAME]'s [PRODUCT_NAME] is more than just a product. It's an experience that promises quality and reliability at an unbeatable price.
Call-to-action button text: Buy Now

Ad headline: Transform Your Life with [PRODUCT_NAME]!
Image description: Lifestyle image featuring [PRODUCT_NAME]
Body text: At [COMPANY NAME], we understand the importance of having a product that truly makes a difference. That's why our [PRODUCT_NAME] is designed to enhance your lifestyle effortlessly.
Call-to-action button text: Get Your [PRODUCT_NAME] Now

packaging.description: Get ready-made templates for crafting effective Facebook ad copies with strong call-to-actions. Perfect for busy D2C brand managers.

pricing_tiers.free: No free tier available at this time.

pricing_tiers.pro: $15 - Includes unlimited access to all templates and priority support.
